Text.text: The image device determines the frame of your preview image. Choose a device that your app mainly runs on.
The preview image is the most important image of your showcase. It should show an overview of your product.
Your picture should be in a horizontal format, unless your image device is a tablet. Any aspect ratio close to 16:9 or 16:10 is fine.
A resolution with at least 1280x720 px is nice to see!
